original: bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo /
analyzed: bklags pas grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo /
translated: The Blessed Lady, the Queen of Knowledge Called The Noble Finger Protector, Which Is Accomplished By Recitation.

original: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: de ltar dge slong rnams ri dri rgyal na gnas te de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang de na bzhugs te /
analyzed: de ltar dge slong rnams ri dri rgyal na gnas te de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang de na bzhugs te /
translated: Thus, the monks were dwelling on Gandhamādana Mountain. At that time, the noble Avalokiteśvara was also dwelling there.

original: des bdag la smras pa /
analyzed: des bdag la smras pa /

original: bu sngags kyi tshig 'di nyon cig /🔽klu'i dbang po rnams kyi dug med par byed /
analyzed: bu sngags kyi tshig 'di nyon cig / klu'i dbang po rnams kyi dug med par byed /
translated: Son, listen to these mantra words.🔽They remove the poison of the nāga lords.

original: sbrul gyi dug med par byed //
analyzed: sbrul gyi dug med par byed //
translated: They remove the poison of snakes.

original: g-yog rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / sems can stobs po che rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / sems can phra mo rnams dang / phra men pha dang / phra men ma dang /
analyzed: g-yog rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / sems can stobs po che rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / sems can phra mo rnams dang / phra men pha dang / phra men ma dang /
translated: the servants, the rākṣasas, the bhūtas, the piśācas, the powerful beings, the kumbhāṇḍas, the tiny beings, the male and female piśācas,

original: chu srin dang / stag dang / grul bum dang / rva can dang / mche ba can gyis de ltar sngags kyi tshig drag shul chen po aam gu li yang dag par thos na sngags kyi gtso bo sems can gdug pa rab tu 'jil bar byed pa ste //
analyzed: chu srin dang / stag dang / grul bum dang / rva can dang / mche ba can gyis de ltar sngags kyi tshig drag shul chen po aam gu li yang dag par thos na sngags kyi gtso bo sems can gdug pa rab tu 'jil bar byed pa ste //
translated: the crocodiles, tigers, kumbhāṇḍas, horned and fanged ones, when they hear the powerful mantra words of Aṅgulimāla, the chief of mantras that subdues the most vicious beings,

original: sngags can gang gis de shes na lha rnams kyi bdug pa yang dag par med par byed do //
analyzed: sngags can gang gis de shes na lha rnams kyi bdug pa yang dag par med par byed do //
translated: if any mantra practitioner knows it, it will destroy the incense of the gods.

original: aom na mo dha ga w'a te a'arya aam gu li /
analyzed: aom na mo dha ga w'a te a'arya aam gu li /
translated: Oṃ, homage to the Blessed One, the Noble Aṅgulimāla!🔽Tadyathā: Oṃ klūṃ.🔽Klūṃ.

analyzed: mi mgo'i thod gyi phreng ba can h'um ksha skad cig thang cig yud tsam nyin par gyi bar du dug sel ba /
translated: Hum kṣa in an instant, a moment, a short time, during the day, removes poison.

original: aa su ra de bi ta dang / dan pa'i stobs 'joms par byed pa can /
analyzed: aa su ra de bi ta dang / dan pa'i stobs 'joms par byed pa can /
translated: Asuras, gods, and the power of the demigods are destroyed.

original: bgegs 'joms par mdzad pa can /
analyzed: bgegs 'joms par mdzad pa can /
translated: Obstructors are destroyed.🔽Homage and praise to you, Mother of the Gods.

original: lha'i yum khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod sv'ah'a sngags kyi tshig drag shul can sbrul gyi mdun du bklag par mi bya ste /
analyzed: lha'i yum khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod sv'ah'a sngags kyi tshig drag shul can sbrul gyi mdun du bklag par mi bya ste /
translated: The powerful mantra should not be read in front of a snake.

original: 'chi ba dang / klad pa 'gas shing tshal ba brgyar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'chi ba dang / klad pa 'gas shing tshal ba brgyar 'gyur ro //
translated: Death, the bursting of the brain, and splitting into a hundred pieces will occur.

original: sngags kyi tshig drag shul can chen mo sbrul gyis thos na thams cad tshig par byed do //
analyzed: sngags kyi tshig drag shul can chen mo sbrul gyis thos na thams cad tshig par byed do //
translated: The mantra is the great fierce one. If a snake hears it, everything will be burned up.

analyzed: pha pham pha rol pham par mdzod cig sv'ah'a /
translated: Pha pha, defeat the enemy, svāhā.

original: bklags pas grub pa aam @518b ku li'i snying po dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: bklags pas grub pa aam @518b ku li'i snying po dang bcas pa'o //
translated: This is the essence of Aṅguli, accomplished by recitation, together with the essence mantra.

analyzed: bandha bandha / rdo rje'i gzungs mang pos bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: ro langs chen mo bcom ldan 'das ma sh'akya thub pa'i zhal nas 'byung ba'o //

analyzed: mu ya munytsa munytsa sv'ah'a /

analyzed: bklags pas 'grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzogs so ////
translated: The Blessed Noble Lady, the Queen of Knowledge called The Finger, is complete.
